objects.text:
• Advanced HEPA Sense Technology
• 5.2 ISEER Energy Efficiency Rating
• Power-Saving Inverter Technology
• Smart Diagnostics System

product_details.name: Daikin Inverter AC - Smart Cooling with HEPA Sense Technology
product_details.description:
• Advanced HEPA Sense technology for superior air purification
• Japanese Technology Made in India - Trusted Quality
• 5.2 ISEER Rating for exceptional energy efficiency
• C.A.R.E Features: Comfort, Air Quality, Reliability, and Efficiency
• Power-saving inverter technology for optimal performance
• Complete cleaning with coanda airflow
• Anti-corrosion protection for extended durability
• Intelligent temperature control for maximum comfort
• Auto-cleaning function for maintenance-free operation
• Stabilizer-free operation for voltage fluctuations
• Quick cooling with efficient heat exchange
• Modern sleek design with easy-to-read display
• Eco-friendly refrigerant for environmental sustainability
• Smart diagnostics for easy maintenance

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern air conditioning product with a visually segmented 2x2 grid layout differentiated by background tones. The top-left quadrant features a bold and geometric headline (`heading`) and compact subheadings (`subheading`, `tagline`) emphasizing innovation and comfort. The top-right quadrant displays a prominently placed air conditioner image (`product_image`). The bottom-left quadrant lists key product features (`description`) and includes pricing information (`price`) along with a distinct call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`). The bottom-right quadrant highlights the product’s origin statement (`badge`) with minimalist elegance. Subtle motion lines and decorative dot clusters add dynamic detail to the layout.

**Color Palette**:
- Sky Blue (#B3E5FC)
- Light Cyan (#E1F5FE)
- Vivid Blue (#0288D1)
- Dark Blue (#01579B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Aqua Blue (#4FC3F7)
- Soft Blue (#81D4FA)
product_color: The product image of the Daikin air conditioner uses a vibrant and clean color palette that communicates reliability and advanced technology. Dominant colors include bright **blue (#0076CE)** for the background gradient, indicating trust and coolness, and **yellow (#FEDD5C)** in the information panels to highlight key features, drawing attention to the CARE values. White (#FFFFFF) provides a clean, modern base, maintaining visual balance, while black (#000000) is used for text for maximum readability. The **gradient blend of blue shades (#0076CE to #00B0F0)** adds depth and professionalism. Accents of **purple (#6F2DA8)** and **red (#E60012)** in the logos enhance vibrancy and appeal.
